item.description:
The Boy Who Cried Werewolf

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2

KIDS • 2010 • TV-PG • 1H 26M

Description
Awkward Jordan Sands, her annoying little brother, Hunter, and their dad were left Wolfsberg Manor in Romania by their mysterious great uncle. Once at the estate, a freak accident causes Jordan to slowly turn into a werewolf!
